name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for selected text in a new tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for selected text in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is for people who prefer the old behavior when using Chrome's built in "Search for" context menu item which now opens search results in a side panel.
